## Introduction

This filter adds a domain preview to each link in the document.
For example the [link to the extension](https://github.com/schochastics/quarto-url-peek) or my [personal page](https://mr.schochastics.net).

You can change the style (color/font-size) in teh yaml header

```yaml
domain_style:
  color: "grey"
  font_size: "10px"
```
